content: BSc in Computer Security and MSc in Data-Intensive Physics, specializing in Machine Learning/AI, Gravitational Wave Analysis, and Cryptography. Former GB athlete, I focused on time management and incremental goals to excel in sports. Transitioned to coaching to mentor athletes and foster their growth. Mental health advocate for athletes, founding a movement to promote enjoyment and recognize their value beyond sport. Pursuing a PhD in gravitational wave science or AI ethics
